price: Nasi hatukumjaalia mwanaadamu yeyote kabla yako kuwa na maisha ya milele. Basi je! Ukifa wewe, wao wataishi milele?
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ ٱلۡخُلۡدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Hatukumjaalia mwanaadamu yeyote kabla yako wewe aishi milele, hata ikawa hao makafiri wakawa wanakutamania ufe wewe. Vipi wanakutamania mauti wewe na hali na wao vile vile watakufa kama wewe? Ukifa wewe, je, ndio wao watabakia kushinda wanaadamu wote?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnā libasharin min qablika al-khul'da afa-in mitta fahumu al-khālidūna
